io.spine.server.entity.storage

Class Columns

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.storage.Columns

  • @Internal
public class Columns
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for working with entity columns.

    The methods of all entities that fit the Java Bean getter spec and annotated with Column are considered columns.

    Inherited columns are taken into account too, but building entity hierarchies is strongly discouraged.

    Note that the returned type of an EntityColumn getter must either be primitive or serializable, otherwise a runtime exception is thrown when trying to get an instance of EntityColumn.

    See Also:
    EntityColumn

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
